thread.title: Did Sofiane Feghouli deserve to be sent off for this challenge on Man Utd's Phil Jones?
thread.title_full: Did Sofiane Feghouli deserve to be sent off for this challenge on Man Utd's Phil Jones?

title: Did Sofiane Feghouli deserve to be sent off for this challenge on Man Utd's Phil Jones?
text:
Premier League Championship Scottish Premiership Did Sofiane Feghouli deserve to be sent off for this challenge on Man Utd's Phil Jones? SOFIANE FEGHOULI was given his marching orders for this tackle on Phil Jones, but did the Algerian deserve to be sent off? PUBLISHED: 11:15, Tue, Jan 3, 2017 | UPDATED: 11:33, Tue, Jan 3, 2017 Should Sofiane Feghouli really have been sent off for this tackle on Phil Jones? Tue, January 3, 2017 Express Sport takes a closer look at the Sofiane Feghouli's tackle on Phil Jones that saw the West Ham United midfielder receive a red card Getty Images 1 of 12 Do these pictures prove that Sofiane Feghouli should not have been sent off against Manchester United? 
The 27-year-old West Ham United winger was dismissed after just 15 minutes against Manchester United at the London Stadium last night, but was referee Mike Dean's decision correct? 
Hammers boss Slaven Bilic is fuming over the sending off , although the home side were lucky to keep Cheikhou Kouyate on the pitch after a reckless lunge on Henrikh Mkhitaryan . 
Scroll through the gallery above and make up your own mind on whether or not Feghouli should have seen red for his challenge on Phil Jones. Related articles
